meanings.definition: Aftershaves: lotions or balms applied to the skin after shaving to soothe and moisturize
meanings.sent1: He applied the aftershaves to his face to make it feel better.
meanings.sent2: After shaving, he always uses aftershaves to keep his skin smooth.
meanings.sent3: The aftershaves made his face smell like a fresh garden!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like aftershaves for his soul, calming and refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The aftershaves felt like a gentle hug for his skin, soothing and comforting.

meanings.definition: Aftershaves: the act of applying aftershave products after shaving
meanings.sent1: His aftershaves were quick and precise, leaving his skin feeling great.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the aftershaves ritual after every shave.
meanings.sent3: The aftershaves dance he did in front of the mirror always made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: The aftershaves of kindness he showed after the argument were unexpected but appreciated.
